GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v4.14.257
GSD.description:
ARM: socfpga: Fix crash with CONFIG_FORTIRY_SOURCE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.257 by commit 25bd60b9f6e820e317c0c4fb6a2451a748d6ef58, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 9c4566a117a6fe404a0e49b27ac71b631945a70f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: socfpga: Fix crash with CONFIG_FORTIRY_SOURCE
